name: Revenue Forecasting Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard for revenue forecasting based on pipeline data and historical close rates.

prd.problemStatement: Sales leadership lacks accurate revenue forecasting tools, relying on manual spreadsheet calculations that are time-consuming, error-prone, and provide limited insight into forecast reliability and trends.
goals: Automate revenue forecast calculations based on pipeline data
Enable scenario planning and what-if analysis

successMetrics.target: 100% of sales leadership using dashboard weekly

inScope: Weighted pipeline forecast by stage probability
Forecast by time period (monthly, quarterly, annual)
outOfScope: Machine learning forecast models (spike required first)

userStories: As a VP of Sales, I want to see real-time revenue forecasts so that I can make informed business decisions
As a sales operations analyst, I want to track forecast accuracy so that I can improve our forecasting methodology
dependencies: Deal pipeline feature must be complete
Historical sales data must be imported
